testsuite.name: test.EndToEndTesting

testcase.name: launchApplication
testcase.system-out: Application is launched successfully with logo

testcase.name: login
testcase.system-out: signup/Login link is clicked Login page is displayed with header - Login to your account Email address is entered Password is entered Login button is clicked

testcase.name: shopProduct
testcase.system-out: Products link is clicked The Products page is displayed Women panel is clicked Tops category is clicked Women products under selected category are displayed A product is added to the cart Product added to the cart confirmation message is displayed Continue Shopping button is clicked Products link is clicked Search bar is clicked for searching men products Input is entered into the search bar Specified men product is displayed Product is added to the cart Product added to the cart confirmation message is displayed View Cart link is clicked The Cart page is displayed The cart contains the following products Blue Top Women > Tops Green Side Placket Detail T-Shirt Men > Tshirts Proceed To Checkout button is clicked

testcase.name: proceedCheckout
testcase.system-out: Additional instruction is provided through comment/message box Place Order button is clicked The Payment page is displayed Name on the is provided Card number is provided CVV is provided Expiry Month is provided Expiry Year is provided Pay And Confirm Order Button is clicked Order is placed successfully with message displayed on the screen as:Congratulations! Your order has been confirmed! Continue button is clciked

testcase.name: logout
testcase.system-out: Logout link is clicked Successfully logged out from the account

testsuite.system-out: Application is launched successfully with logo signup/Login link is clicked Login page is displayed with header - Login to your account Email address is entered Password is entered Login button is clicked Products link is clicked The Products page is displayed Women panel is clicked Tops category is clicked Women products under selected category are displayed A product is added to the cart Product added to the cart confirmation message is displayed Continue Shopping button is clicked Products link is clicked Search bar is clicked for searching men products Input is entered into the search bar Specified men product is displayed Product is added to the cart Product added to the cart confirmation message is displayed View Cart link is clicked The Cart page is displayed The cart contains the following products Blue Top Women > Tops Green Side Placket Detail T-Shirt Men > Tshirts Proceed To Checkout button is clicked Additional instruction is provided through comment/message box Place Order button is clicked The Payment page is displayed Name on the is provided Card number is provided CVV is provided Expiry Month is provided Expiry Year is provided Pay And Confirm Order Button is clicked Order is placed successfully with message displayed on the screen as:Congratulations! Your order has been confirmed! Continue button is clciked Logout link is clicked Successfully logged out from the account
